question: Laura is an avid gardener. Two days ago, she received 30 new potted plants from her favorite plant nursery. She already has 7 potted plants on each of the 58 window ledges of her large country home. Feeling generous, she has decided that she will give 2 of the potted plants from each ledge to friends and family tomorrow. How many potted plants will Laura remain with?
answer:
Two days ago, before receiving the plants, Laura had 7*58 = <<7*58=406>>406 potted plants
After receiving an additional 30 plants, she therefore had a total of 406 + 30 = <<406+30=436>>436 potted plants
Tomorrow, Lauras plant giveaway will be 58*2 = <<58*2=116>>116 potted plants.
She will therefore remain with 436 - 116 = <<436-116=320>>320 potted plants.
#### 320
